name: Infinite Descent
description:
Download the EXE for smoothest play experience (and slightly better graphics)

Fall through an increasingly challenging set of platforming obstacle courses. How many screens can you survive without dying?

Music by Mark Sparling from the Album "Daily Songs Vol. 33 (March 2019)", used with permission.

Tracks Used (In order of occurrence):

  • Daily March 13 2019 #970 (LSDJ) | Mark Sparling
  • Daily March 16 2019 #973 (LSDJ) | Mark Sparling
  • Daily March 14 2019 #971 (LSDJ) | Mark Sparling
  • Daily March 19 2019 #976 (LSDJ) | Mark Sparling
  • Daily March 11 2019 #968 (LSDJ) | Mark Sparling
Controls:

Move: WASD / Arrow Keys / Left Joystick

  • Jump: Space / Gamepad-South
  • Pause: Escape / Start 
    • Adjust Music / SFX Volume from the Pause Menu
  • Supports Gamepad!
    • You can set Gamepad to Ignore from the Start Menu

Art + Engine built ahead of time. Level Design + Core mechanic made in 22 hours for Jam.
